item.description:
Jodo-e - Prince Siddhartha left his castle in his twenties and traveled all over to seek the truth of life. He found out that various practices he encountered were not the right way, so that he decided to meditate under a tree at Gaya. After seven days of meditation, in the early morning of December 8, the prince gained Enlightenment and became the Buddha, the Enlightened One. The Jodo-e service is held to commemorate the event of the historical Buddha gaining Enlightenment here in this world. Everyone is welcome.

This will be a simple service held more like a Family Service. Please come and help decorate the Bodhi tree ahead of time.

Â
item.name: Jodo-e Service (Buddha's Enlightenment)
